name: UFO99
summary:
Perform your best flying, speeding and dodging skills with your favorite character!
Block monsters can be found floating around in this colorful universe, so watch out! Pick up big hammers and smash them. Keep challenging levels to get a higher rank and score!
Giant bosses hide away in the Demon Key. Dodge their attacks, pick up magic items and fight back. Retrieve the long-lost UFO99 letter gems!
Features of UFO99:
#Super Easy - Flying & Combat
Fly, speed-up, dodge, pick up hammers and smash block monsters!
#Super Fun - Local Multiplayer Co-op Game
1-4 player co-op mode. Play with friends and family!
#Super Healing - Character Gashapons
Over 60 cute, healing characters. Fight with different characters each time!
#Super Relaxing - Play Anytime, Even For A Short Time
Each game requires only about 1 to 3 minutes. Lots of random levels with endless variations!
#Super Exciting - Combat Giant Bosses
Giant bosses are in hiding. Stay alert and feel the thrill of this easy-to-play game!
#Super Rich - Special Power-up Items
5 special power-up items allow you to always be the winner!
#Super Cute - Colorful Graphics
The various bright colors and cute styles can light up your day!
Tons of gold coins and items are given away each day!Download now to get countless gifts!
Start playing today!
